sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SLOUGH, a deep muddy place. The caſt ſkin of a ſnake, the damp of a coal pit, and the ſcar of a wound, are alſo called by the ſame appellation. The ſlough of a wild boar is the bed, soil, or mire, wherein he wallows, or in which he lies in the day-time.
